meanings.definition: The state or quality of being anelastic.
meanings.sent1: The anelasticities of the rubber band made it difficult to stretch.
meanings.sent2: The anelasticities of the metal rod were evident after it was bent.
meanings.sent3: The anelasticities of the silly putty caused it to stay in a strange shape.
meanings.sent4: Her anelasticities were like a memory that couldn't be reshaped.
meanings.sent5: The anelasticities of the fabric were like trying to fold a stiff board.

meanings.definition: The property of a material that does not return to its original shape after being deformed.
meanings.sent1: The anelasticities of the clay sculpture remained even after it was squished.
meanings.sent2: The anelasticities of the foam cushion were noticeable after being sat on.
meanings.sent3: The anelasticities of the balloon made it look like a funny animal.
meanings.sent4: The anelasticities of the memory foam pillow were like a hug that never let go.
meanings.sent5: The anelasticities of the rubber ball made it bounce unpredictably.
